item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: It's All Nonsense Quest Guide (Cheshire Cat Level 4 Friendship Quest)
item.description:
After the unfortunate events that took place in the previous friendship quest in Disney Dreamlight Valley , the Cheshire Cat asks for players' help to throw a Nonsense Party so he can apologize to his fellow villagers. You will need to cook some recipes and craft some decorative items before starting the party to complete the quest.

The It's All Nonsense quest requires unlocking Tiana and progressing with Scar in Disney Dreamlight Valley , so keep that in mind. Additionally, the Frosted Heights biome must be available as you will require materials from that area.

How To Trigger It's All Nonsense Quest In DDV - Disney Dreamlight Valley

Level up the Cheshire Cat to friendship level four and complete the other requirements, Tiana and Scar , to trigger the It's All Nonsense quest in DDV . The mischievous cat regrets his past actions during the Furniture Fluster quest and wishes to make amends with the characters. So, he suggests throwing a Nonsense Party to bond with the other villagers.

The first step is to cook some food for the guests. The Cheshire Cat gives you two recipe books in DDV and asks you to prepare them while he figures out the decorations.

Recipe

Ingredients

Garlic Chocolate Tart

  • Cheese
  • Cocoa Bean
  • Garlic
  • Egg
  • Wheat

Tea Sandwiches

  • Wheat
  • Corn
  • Cherry
  • Any Fish

How To Complete It's All Nonsense Quest In DDV - Disney Dreamlight Valley

Now that the food has been taken care of, the Cheshire Cat gives Dreamers a list of materials to collect to build the necessary decorations for the Nonsense Party.

Material

Location

Coal Ore x25

  • Purchased from Kristoff's Stall
  • Mine any Mining Spot

Snowball x25

  • The Frosted Heights

Raspberry x30

  • The Plaza
  • Peaceful Meadow

Oregano x10

  • The Plaza

Craft the Cheshire Smile Balloon Arch and place it near the Cheshire Cat Tree as well as three random decorations . You can place something that fits the theme or random items. It doesn't matter as it's a Nonsense Party after all. Next, wear something orange and three random pieces of clothing to be ready for the party.

Speak with the Cheshire Cat and take the Nonsense Banquet Table to place it near the tree as well. Finally, invite Remy, Tiana, Scar, and Daisy to the party and then take a picture to celebrate the moment. Ask everybody how the Nonsense Party was and then talk to the Cheshire Cat to complete It's All Nonsense quest in DDV .

Your comment has not been saved

item.title: This Grand Theft Auto 6 Cast Member Feels Like a Mix Between Two GTA 5 Characters
item.description:
Summary

  • Rockstar has revealed a roster of new characters for Grand Theft Auto 6.
  • Based on new details, Cal Hampton appears to be a mix of Jimmy De Santa and Lester Crest from GTA 5.
  • Cal Hampton's seeming immaturity combined with his technical skills and love of conspiracy theories call to mind aspects of both Lester and Jimmy, implying he will play a similar role to them in GTA 6's plot.

Grand Theft Auto 6 is without a doubt one of (if not the) most anticipated upcoming games right now. Rockstar Games' long-running action-packed crime series is a titan in the industry, and Grand Theft Auto 6 is expected to break records upon launch, even though it's been over a decade since the most recent entry, 2013's GTA 5 . GTA 5 and its online component went on to become the highest-grossing commercial entertainment product of all time, raking in an astounding $8.6 billion, and counting.

Naturally, the hype around GTA 6 is hard to understate. The latest big news, though, is that Rockstar announced that Grand Theft Auto 6 will be delayed to May 26, 2026. While this perhaps wasn't a huge surprise given the developer's history and practices, along with many industry pundits and fans suspecting it would happen, it's still a pretty big letdown for those hoping it would hit its original Fall 2025 window. The studio has, however, given fans some updates, putting out a new trailer and a website showing off more of its modern Vice City setting and breaking down a few of its starring characters. And one of these listed appears to channel a combination of the looks and habits of two of GTA 5 's most prominent supporting characters.

Grand Theft Auto 6's Cal Hampton Seems Like a Cross Between Lester and Jimmy from GTA 5

Lester Crest and Jimmy De Santa in Grand Theft Auto 5

Closely connected to one of the main trio of Grand Theft Auto 5 's protagonists, Michael De Santa, Lester Crest and Jimmy De Santa are featured heavily in the story. Jimmy, Michael's 20-year-old son, embodies the stereotypes of a privileged youth, displaying elements of affluenza, with a penchant for indulging in recreational drugs and spending much of his time playing videogames. In true Rockstar fashion, Jimmy represents a caricature of the modern American slacker who thinks too highly of himself, but is also at least partly self-aware of his position, even sporting a neck tattoo reading, "Entitled." Jimmy finds himself getting into all kinds of trouble in GTA 5 that Michael often has to begrudgingly fish him out of.

Lester Crest, also going by his handle "Long John Teabag" or "LJT", is the literal "guy in the chair" for Michael and the crew he puts together for various heists in Grand Theft Auto 5 . Lester suffers from a debilitating disease that largely confines him to a wheelchair, but he is a technical wizard and expert hacker. He was actually part of Michael's original crew, although he backed out of the ill-fated Ludendorff bank robbery that saw Michael going into hiding under the assumed identity he has at the start of GTA 5 . Once Michael reunites with Lester in Los Santos, he serves as a scout and technical specialist, providing intel and planning many of the jobs for Michael, Franklin, and Trevor.

Lester is voiced by Jay Klaitz ( Jessica Jones ) and Jimmy is portrayed by Danny Tamberelli ( All That .)

How Grand Theft Auto 6's Cal Hampton Looks Like a Blend of GTA 5's Jimmy De Santa and Lester Crest

Revealed on the official Grand Theft Auto 6 website, Cal Hampton is described as:

Jason’s friend who is at the low tide of America and happy there. Cal feels safest hanging at home, snooping on Coast Guard comms with a few beers and some private browser tabs open. Casual paranoia loves company, but his friend Jason has bigger plans.

Based on this, Cal seems to split the difference between Jimmy and Lester, both in physical appearance and personality. Rocking a shirt reading, "Violence is good. Thanks, videogames", Cal is said to embrace internet conspiracies, but like Lester, also has some true technical prowess. Given everything detailed about Cal Hampton, it can likely be inferred that he will serve a similar role to Lester for Jason and Lucia in Grand Theft Auto 6 , while displaying major shades of Jimmy's reckless immaturity.

item.title: Roblox: Prison Pump Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Prison Pump Codes
  • How to Redeem Prison Pump Codes
  • How to Get More Prison Pump Codes

Playing Prison Pump you have to survive in prison with other players. The law of the jungle reigns here, so you need to be the strongest to avoid humiliation. Fortunately, there are several places in the yard where players can train. To increase the effectiveness of your training, you should use Prison Pump codes.

Roblox codes grant you various goodies from the developers, such as Cash. Just a few of them will be enough to purchase starting upgrades.

Updated May 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Prison Pump has added a new code that gives you a boost in Luck. Redeeming it will add 250 Luck to help you get more out of your in-game activities. Several older codes also offer extra Luck and Cash, giving you a solid edge as you train and upgrade. These bonuses can speed up your progress significantly. Keep checking for new codes as more rewards could drop soon.

All Prison Pump Codes

Working Prison Pump Codes

  • theoldman - Redeem this code to get 250 Luck (NEW)
  • luckyducky - Redeem this code to get 250 Luck
  • luckyluke1 - Redeem this code to get 150 Luck
  • musclemania - Redeem this code to get 500 Cash
  • inmate001 - Redeem this code to get 500 Cash
  • Pumptime - Redeem this code to get 500 Cash
  • shankster - Redeem this code to get 300 Cash
  • Release - Redeem this code to get 100 Cash

Expired Prison Pump Codes

There are no expired codes in Prison Pump . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Prison Pump is a training sim, so most of the time, you will be training to build muscle. But this is a difficult task since at first, your stamina is very limited. To increase it, you need to eat. However, the portions are also limited until you bring enough Cash, which is quite hard to earn. Luckily, there is a way to get money quickly, namely using Prison Pump codes.

Almost all of these codes contain money. Some of them can even offer you up to 500 Cash. It is worth noting that their validity is limited. And if you do not have time to redeem them, the rewards will no longer be available.

How to Redeem Prison Pump Codes

You only need to make a few clicks to use Prison Pump codes since this feature works as simply as in most other Roblox experiences. In addition, it is available even during the tutorial, which will significantly speed up your progress. And for your convenience, you can follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Prison Pump .
  • Then, click on the Menu button on the right side of the screen.
  • After that, click on Codes and enter the code in the new window.
  • Finally, click Confirm to get your well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More Prison Pump Codes

If you don't want to miss out on new Prison Pump codes, we recommend you bookmark this article. As soon as the developers release new goodies, we will update it, as well as our other Roblox code guides. Players can also visit the official developer pages:

  • The Gang Stockholm Roblox group
  • The Gang Roblox Discord server
  • The Gang Gaming YouTube channel
  • The Gang Gaming X page

item.title: Roblox: Neighbors Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Neighbors Codes
  • How to Redeem Neighbors Codes

Neighbors is a game on the Roblox platform that will let you engage in communication and interaction with other players. It works like a chat roulette, but in addition to that, you will also visit other users in their in-game home. By using Neighbors codes, you can get some credits and skins that will help you create your own style so that you are welcomed into every house. This is essential because, for some reason, most players do not want to communicate with those who have a "noob" skin.

Updated May 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh code has been added, giving you the chance to collect some extra Credits. Since it’s the only active option right now, it’s worth using while it’s still valid. More rewards may become available in future updates, so keeping an eye on this guide can be helpful. Check back again soon to see what’s new.

All Neighbors Codes

The first impression of a person is formed in a few seconds based on their behavior, external features, and appearance. In this game, you meet a random player and, of course, the first thing they notice is your appearance. You can be kicked out for looking bad even before you write anything, so use codes to be stylish and avoid being alone from the very beginning of the game.

All Working Neighbors Codes

  • Bunny - Redeem this code to get Credits (NEW)

Expired Codes

  • ANNIVERSARY
  • CUPID
  • HAWK
  • SWEETHEART
  • HAWK
  • ILOVEBOOGLE
  • 60K
  • THANKSGIVING24
  • SPOOKY
  • HALLOWEEN
  • 50K
  • 100K
  • HOUSESKINS
  • 200K
  • LABORDAY
  • BACKTOSCHOOL
  • 40K
  • 200MILLION
  • TREASURE
  • RECESS
  • 20K
  • HOP
  • SHAMROCK
  • WINTER23
  • HOLIDAYCUT
  • 10KMEMBERS
  • 17+RELEASE
  • AUTUMN2
  • FRIDAY13
  • ILOVEBOOGLE
  • LABORDAY2023
  • NEIGHBORS50MILLION
  • PUBLICTEST1
  • THANKSGIVING23
  • WOOSH

How to Redeem Neighbors Codes

Redeeming codes in Neighbors is not a long or complicated process, as opposed to some other games on the Roblox platform. Here, you can do it as soon as you enter the game. Here are instructions for those who don't know how to redeem codes:

  • Launch Neighbors .
  • Pay attention to the upper-right corner of the screen. Here, you will notice several buttons with different icons.
  • Among them, you need to find and interact with the first one with the key icon.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu interface where you can redeem the codes. There will be two interactive options: an input field, and a Submit button.
  • Select the code you want to redeem and enter it in the input field. It is recommended to copy and paste the code to avoid typos when entering it manually.
  • When the code is entered, click the Submit button to complete the reward request.
  • If successful, you will see a green notification at the top of the screen.

If you do not see this notification, the code you want to redeem may have expired. In such cases, you can't get the rewards that the code provides. To avoid this in the future, redeem active codes as soon as possible, both in this and other Roblox games you play.
